title: Gab & Juls: Potter, Boehly and Chelsea's New Era
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens take a deep dive on the dawn of a new era at Chelsea by questioning Todd Boehly’s comments made at a financial conference and analyzing Chelsea’s performance in Graham Potter’s first game. They also take a look at Bayern's great second half against Barcelona, Erling Haalnd's Cruyff impression on his winning goal, James Rodriguez's latest move and a possibly eternal Zlatan Ibrahimovic.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Chelsea drop more UCL points as Todd Boehly makes more headlines; Barca and Bayern's tale of two halves; Haaland's Cruyff impression
